qas.question: What animal's food sources were greatly affected with the loss of wolves in Yellowstone National Park?
Broader ecological impacts can occur when an apex predator is removed, in the case of Yellowstone, this includes alteration to the?
Loose soil from lack of trees along the river bed resulted in?
The removal of what animal from Yellowstonw National Park affected beaver populations?
How did the removal of wolves from Yellowstone affect beaver habitats?
Why were plant populations affected after wolves were eliminated from Yellowstone?

answers.text: Without predation, herbivores began to over-graze many woody browse species

qas.question: How did wolves in Yellowstone help beavers eat well?

answers.text: wolves often kept animals from grazing in riparian areas, which protected beavers from having their food sources encroached upon

plausible_answers.text: had profound impacts on the trophic pyramid

Where did beavers keep animals from grazing?
